# Hanzo Industries

> Enterprise and industry-specific AI solutions by Hanzo AI.

## About
Hanzo Industries delivers vertical AI solutions tailored for specific industries. Built on the Hanzo AI platform, these solutions provide domain-specific models, compliance frameworks, and integration patterns for enterprises in finance, healthcare, government, retail, and other regulated sectors. Each solution includes pre-trained models, industry data pipelines, and deployment templates.

## Key Features
- Finance: Risk modeling, fraud detection, algorithmic trading, regulatory compliance
- Healthcare: Medical imaging analysis, clinical NLP, drug discovery, HIPAA-compliant infrastructure
- Government: Secure AI deployment, document processing, citizen services, FedRAMP-ready
- Retail: Demand forecasting, personalization engines, inventory optimization
- Custom model fine-tuning for domain-specific use cases
- Enterprise SLAs with dedicated support
- On-premise and hybrid cloud deployment options
- Compliance and audit frameworks (SOC 2, HIPAA, FedRAMP)
